movies.title: Little Baby Jesus
movies.plot: Charming 60-something José () returns to Prague after 30 years living in Mexico, though he was convinced that he would never see his hometown again. He was persuaded by his deeply religious Mexican wife Dolores (), who is convinced that only a miracle that might be fulfilled by Prague's famous Infant Jesus can help their daughter Penelopé () get pregnant. And the ideal time for this is Christmas. And when Ruda (), his friend from Prague, also insists, José agrees to return to the places he used to know and to the memories that they bring back - including his former Prague love Kveta (). And it becomes evident that the Infant Jesus is not the only one capable of making miracles come true in Prague. Penelopé's longed-for conception is definitely not the only one...
movies.simplePlot: Charming 60-something José () returns to Prague after 30 years living in Mexico, though he was convinced that he would never see his hometown again. He was persuaded by his ...

biography.placeOfBirth: Zlín, Protectorate Bohemia and Moravia [now Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Josef Abrhám was born on December 14, 1939 in Zlín, Protectorate Bohemia and Moravia. He is an actor, known for Leaving (2011), Beauty in Trouble (2006) and Moi qui ai servi le roi d'Angleterre (2006). He has been married to Libuse Safránková since 1976. They have one child.
biography.name: Josef Abrhám

biography.bio: Libuse Safránková was born on June 7, 1953 in Brno, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Kolya (1996), Three Wishes for Cinderella (1973) and Gympl s (r)ucením omezeným (2012). She is married to Josef Abrhám. They have one child.
biography.name: Libuse Safránková

biography.placeOfBirth: La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico
biography.bio: Dolores Heredia was born on October 6, 1966 in La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico. She is an actress, known for Get the Gringo (2012), Vantage Point (2008) and Esperanza et ses saints (1999).
biography.name: Dolores Heredia

biography.bio: Aislinn Derbez is a Mexican actress born and raised in Mexico City, to the artist Gabriela Michel and Eugenio Derbez, who is considered to be one of the greatest and most popular Mexican actors and comedians alive. She is the granddaughter of the Mexican star Silvia Derbez, and sister of the artists Vadhir Derbez, Jose Eduardo Derbez and Aitana Derbez, she has also 2 half sisters from her mother's second marriage. Aislinn is of Mexican from her maternal grandmother and paternal grandfather, and French from her paternal grandmother and maternal grandfather. Derbez got married to the Mexican/American star Mauricio Ochmann in 2016. Aislinn received the bachelor of Visual Arts at the School of Visual Arts in New York City. She lived in NYC for 4 years, where she studied theatre, photography and writing as well. Derbez started as a model at the age of 15. Her acting career started after her studies in NYC, in 2009, in the Mexican film industry, participating in several movies and TV series in Mexico, South America and Europe. She has starred about 15 commercial and independent films from 2009 to 2016, and several TV series as well. She starred the film "A LA Mala" which was a top ten box office hit. Today Derbez is one of the most popular and well-known Mexican actresses of her generation. In 2016 she moved to Los Angeles and has participated in independent films and series like "Win it All" starring with Jake Johnson, directed by Joe Swanberg, and starring the Netflix anthology series "EASY". Derbez and her husband Ochmann created the production company "A Toda Madre Entertainment" in California, and are producing content for Mexico and the Hispanic market in the US.
biography.name: Aislinn Derbez

biography.placeOfBirth: Prague, Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia [now Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Václav Postránecký was born on September 8, 1943 in Prague, Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia. He is an actor and director, known for Doktori z Pocátku (2013), Vinari (2014) and Kooky (2010).
biography.name: Václav Postránecký

biography.bio: Radúz Mácha is an actor, known for Cesty domú (2010), Little Baby Jesus (2013) and Lousy Bastards (2014).
biography.name: Radúz Mácha

biography.bio: Danica Jurcová was born on August 5, 1976 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Panelák (2008), 360 (2011) and The Mall (2012).
biography.name: Danica Jurcová

biography.bio: Igor Chmela was born on January 2, 1971 in Ostrava, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Cesty domú (2010), Particka (2011) and Ordinace v ruzové zahrade (2005).
biography.name: Igor Chmela

biography.bio: Marian Roden was born on May 31, 1964 in Ceske Budejovice, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Grapes (2008), Wild Flowers (2000) and Timeless (1998).
biography.name: Marian Roden

biography.bio: Natálie Rehorová is an actress, known for Un lac (2008), Flower Buds (2011) and A Night Too Young (2012).
biography.name: Natálie Rehorová

biography.placeOfBirth: Bezdekov u Klatov, Protectorate Bohemia and Moravia [now Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Oldrich Vlach was born on July 3, 1941 in Bezdekov u Klatov, Protectorate Bohemia and Moravia. He is an actor, known for Shortcuts (1981), Mon cher petit village (1985) and The Land Gone Wild (1997).
biography.name: Oldrich Vlach

biography.bio: Pavel Kríz was born on April 18, 1961 in Brno, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for Ulice (2005), Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol (2011) and The Mall (2012).
biography.name: Pavel Kríz

biography.bio: Filip Antonio was born on September 2, 2003 in Prague, Czech Republic. He is an actor, known for In the Shadow (2012), Helena (2012) and Men in Hope (2011).
biography.name: Filip Antonio

biography.bio: Emily Hrabáková is an actress, known for Doktori z Pocátku (2013) and Little Baby Jesus (2013).
biography.name: Emily Hrabáková

biography.bio: Pablo Cruz was born on February 2, 1984 in Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico as Pablo Cruz Guerrero. He is an actor, known for El hotel de los secretos (2016), Por siempre mi amor (2013) and From Prada to Nada (2011).
biography.name: Pablo Cruz
